publications.title: EgoControl: Controllable Egocentric Video Generation via 3D Full-Body Poses
publications.authors: E. Pallotta*, S.M. Azar*, L. Doorenbos, S. Ozsoy, U. Iqbal, J. Gall
publications.description: We present EgoControl, a novel framework for controllable egocentric video generation using 3D full-body poses, enabling realistic and diverse video synthesis from user-defined motion trajectories.

publications.title: Sequence-Adaptive Video Prediction in Continuous Streams using Diffusion Noise Optimization
publications.authors: S.M. Azar, E. Bahrami, E. Pallotta, G. Francesca, R. Timofte, J. Gall
publications.description: We introduce SAVIDNO, a novel approach for video prediction in continuous streams that optimizes diffusion noise to adaptively enhance prediction accuracy over time.

publications.title: SyncVP: Joint Diffusion for Synchronous Multi-Modal Video Prediction
publications.authors: E. Pallotta, S.M. Azar, S. Li, O. Zatsarynna, J. Gall
publications.description: We propose SyncVP, a novel diffusion-based model for simultaneous video prediction across multiple modalities, achieving state-of-the-art results on benchmark datasets.

publications.title: Race Against the Machine: a Fully-annotated, Open-design Dataset of Autonomous and Piloted High-speed Flight
publications.authors: M. Bosello, D. Aguiari, Y. Keuter, E. Pallotta, S. Kiade, G. Caminati, F. Pinzarrone, J. Halepota, J. Panerati, G. Pau
publications.description: We present a comprehensive dataset for high-speed drone racing, featuring both autonomous and piloted flights, complete with detailed annotations to facilitate research in robotics and autonomous systems.

publications.title: TeamUnibo at SemEval-2023 Task 6: A transformer based approach to Rhetorical Roles prediction and NER in Legal Texts
publications.authors: Y. Noviello*, E. Pallotta*, F. Pinzarrone*, G. Tanzi*
publications.description: This paper details TeamUnibo's approach to SemEval-2023 Task 6, utilizing transformer-based models for effective prediction of rhetorical roles and named entity recognition in legal documents.
